summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3779 for the improvement of 27th Avenue Northwest, from the south margin of West 73rd Street to West 83rd Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46516, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
